ygData.subject: Re: What happens to the molds?
ygData.messageBody:
molds are destroyed regardless

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Frank Hartmann [SMTP:FRANHART@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 11:27 AM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] What happens to the molds?
>
> From: "Frank Hartmann" <FRANHART@...>
>
> OK, so I'm ready to start making items requiring molds. In Oggok, the only
> molds which are available are lantern molds and sewing kit molds. I
> believe lanterns are easier to make so I'll be starting on those. My
> question is what happens to the molds upon success or failure. Will my
> mold be destroyed on success? On failure? Is it random?
>
> Kludge
> Ogre Shaman
> Rallos Zek
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
